mapper.select: select sum( case str_month when 01 then sum end) as jan22, sum(case str_month when 02 then sum end) as feb22, sum(case str_month when 03 then sum end )as mar22, sum(case str_month when 04 then sum end) as apr22, sum(case str_month when 05 then sum end) as may22, sum(case str_month when 06 then sum end )as jun22, sum(case str_month when 07 then sum end )as jul22, sum(case str_month when 08 then sum end )as aug22, sum(case str_month when 09 then sum end )as sep22, sum(case str_month when 10 then sum end )as oct22, sum(case str_month when 11 then sum end )as nov22, sum(case str_month when 12 then sum end )as dec22 from ( select count(*) as sum, substr(b_joindate, 6,2) as str_month, substr(b_joindate, 1,4) as str_year FROM Buyer where substr(b_joindate, 1,4) =2022 group by substr(b_joindate,6,2) ) buyer order by str_month;
